name: Simple Sumo
description:
Need to settle the score? This couch competitive arcade game lets you literally throw yourself at your opponent to push them out of the circle and claim victory!

Simple Sumo is an easy to pick up, hard to master local competitive arcade game made for quick and fun conflict resolution. Aim and patience are essential to come out on top!

Customize your character then jump into a match against your opponent, throwing your body across the screen to knock them out! Hold your charge button (Up arrow or W key) to fling further and stronger, and hold your respective shift key to slow your rotation for better accuracy.

This game was originally made for a 48hr game jam with theme "Push and Pull"
